title: What tank junglers can I play in S6 that are viable?
body: Hello, I just came back to playing this came after quitting in S3. The new jungle changes seem pretty overwhelming. Anyways, I'm just wondering what tank junglers are viable in S6? I used to play Nautilus, Sejuani, Jarvan and Volibear. Would prefer suggestions for any tank junglers that have high CC. No assassins please.
